edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.rdf

Interface RdfBackend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JenaRdfBackend

    public interface RdfBackend
    The RdfBackend interface used to generate data sets from Strings and Strings from data sets. This is TripleStore-dependent.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getOutput(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset, Format format)
      Writes the given data set in the given format to a string serialization
      org.apache.commons.rdf.api.RDF getRdf()
      Returns the underlying RDF implementation
      boolean isValidInputFormat(Format format)
      Tests whether the given format is usable by the actual RdfBackend implementation
      default org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset readFromFile(java.lang.String filename, Format format)
      Reads in a given file and parses its content in the given format
      org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset readFromString(java.lang.String serialization, Format format)
      Parses a data set from the given String in the given format

        default org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset readFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                        Format format)
                                                 throws WapException
        Reads in a given file and parses its content in the given format
        Parameters:
        filename - The file to read
        format - The format to use
        Returns:
        The parsed data set, null if any IO errors occurred
        Throws:
        WapException - For any error aside from IO errors

                                                  Format format)
                                           throws WapException
        Parses a data set from the given String in the given format
        Parameters:
        serialization - The serialized RDF
        format - The format
        Returns:
        The parsed data set
        Throws:
        WapException - If any error occurs

      • getOutput

        java.lang.String getOutput(org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset dataset,
                           Format format)
                    throws WapException
        Writes the given data set in the given format to a string serialization
        Parameters:
        dataset - The data set
        format - The format
        Returns:
        The serialized string
        Throws:
        WapException - In case any error occurred

      • isValidInputFormat

        boolean isValidInputFormat(Format format)
        Tests whether the given format is usable by the actual RdfBackend implementation
        Parameters:
        format - The format to check
        Returns:
        true if supported
